programmes.show_description: In her attempts to bring her feuding neighbours together, Natalie finds an unexpected ally in someone who wants to stay out of the battle altogether. (2024)
Hazel seeks out the help of trivia host Theo when she gets a second chance at promoting her new subscription box on a major Boston morning show. (2022)

Contest winners try to solve a fake murder for a grand prize, but the event goes awry when a real murder occurs and secrets are uncovered. Cozy crime thriller. (2025)
After growing bored with her life, Ella embarks on a soul-searching journey to Paris, navigating romance, self-discovery and cheese amid the city of love's enchanting backdrop. (2024)
Stella designs hats and fascinators for socialite Rosalind and meets her son Christian who's training a horse to compete in the Louisville Derby. (2025)
A couple struggling to conceive receives an antique watch from a stranger, leading the wife to realise that the answers she seeks will come in due time. (2024)
Sparks fly between the owner of an organic market and a celebrity chef as they work together to make a line of meal kits. Can they get past their workaholic tendencies to find love? (2023)
After losing her husband and job on the same day, Jane is down in the dumps. But when a charming barista offers a helping hand, coffee isn't the only thing that brews between them. (2023)
Lilly, a hopeless romantic and literary enthusiast, is surprised when her wish to talk to her favourite author comes true and Jane Austen herself appears in her life. (2024)
A project manager must choose between nurturing a blooming romance in her small hometown in the USA and moving to London to pursue her dream job. (2021)
When aspiring music producer Chloe lands her first gig working with former rising star Dustin, they race to create an epic song of the summer. (2024)
As the Easter holiday approaches, a woman rediscovers a blessing bracelet that helps restore her faith and renew her belief in love. (2023)
Sparks fly when a matchmaker pairs Molly and Jacob, until they discover that they are rival deli owners. Will a Hanukkah miracle keep their love afloat? (2022)

As she enters a new chapter in her life, a bookstore owner finds love and purpose after agreeing to review a famous author's new novel. (2024)
When Celeste loses her teaching job, her boss puts her forward for an au-pair job with infamous New York property tycoon Richard Trapp. (2024)
Working together could put a budding personal stylist and an aspiring travel photographer on a path to their dream jobs, but will they lose their hearts along the way? (2022)
A blogger is offered her own column after her post about a terrible date goes viral. But there's a catch - to keep writing good content, she needs to keep seeing the bad date. (2023)
Mystery Island hosts a corporate retreat with a guest being Emilia's ex-fianc√©. Old feelings become complicated, tensions run high and allegations arise when a guest is found dead. (2025)
Recently single Stephanie moves to Miami and takes a job working as a tutor. But when her love for their father grows, the two kids decide to put a stop to it. (2023)
After her father leaves her with a treasure hunt for her inheritance, Meg teams up with a grumpy farmer to find where X marks the spot. (2023)
When two colleagues are mistaken for a couple, they must keep up appearances to not disappoint their biggest client. But could their little white lie turn into something more? (2023)
Hazel seeks out the help of trivia host Theo when she gets a second chance at promoting her new subscription box on a major Boston morning show. (2022)
